definition: to tap/to knock (against sth hard)/to knock (mud from boots, ashes from a pipe etc)
to tap/to knock (against sth hard)/to knock (mud from boots, ashes from a pipe etc)

sentences.english: In the darkness they stumbled and squelched, lost their way and nearly drowned.
sentences.chinese: 黑暗中磕磕絆絆還迷了路，還差點淹死。

sentences.english: There will be bumps on the road to recovery.
sentences.chinese: 在復甦的道路上總會有些磕磕絆絆的。
